__e: Do you realize what that means? That means that you must like me a little bit.
Daniel has to go. He can't tell anything, but he needs to be helped. Just a little cash and he can go to never coming back.
You might have lightning, but you missing everything else. - What?
You like me a little bit, don't you?
Oh, well then, yes, perhaps a little.
Come with us, we're going to have some more fun. Come on!
Can you give me a little more time than that?
If you want to see them a bit more closer, just knock at the door and step in.
Can you give me a little more time than that?
- But if I just stand here long enough--
He beat you. I'd say he was just a little faster, just a mite faster than you was.
Anyway, all you can ask of anyone is to take a little and make it go a long, long way.
We've only got a little more way to go.
Here you can tell us a little of what you need and how we can help you carry your project forward. We promise to respond as soon as possible.
- Of what? - A small shot of rum.
NOW, YOU'RE NOT TAKING OFF WITHOUT A LITTLE BIT OF PROFIT TO SHOW FOR ALL OUR WORK, ARE YOU?
I thought maybe I could go out for a little while into the air.
Just a little while longer and I'll have that thousand.
You can talk yourself into any kind of nightmare you want. You just have to let the gates down a bit, and that stuff seeps in.
